translations: n．防腐师：为尸体进行防腐处理的专业人员，通常在殡仪馆工作。
· The embalmers prepared the body for the funeral.
防腐师为葬礼准备了尸体。

phrs.translation: 殡仪主管和尸体防腐者
殡仪员和尸体防腐人员

sentences.sentence: But the Louisiana Board of Embalmers and Funeral Directors has ordered him to "cease and desist".
sentences.translation: 但路易斯安那州殡葬业从业者协会责令他“停止营业”。

sentences.sentence: But the Louisiana Board of Embalmers and Funeral Directors has ordered him to "cease and desist". Heaven knows what harm a corpse might suffer from an unlicensed coffin.
sentences.translation: 但是路易·安娜州的殡葬业委员会用相关法律“制止”他这么做——上帝才知道一个没有无执照的棺材可能给尸体带来的痛苦。

sentences.sentence: Arkansas Codes title 17 - Professions, Occupations, and Businesses Subtitle 2 - Nonmedical Professions Chapter 29 - Embalmers, Funeral Directors, and Funeral Establishments.
sentences.translation: 阿肯色州法典第17标题卷-行业，职业与商业第2副标题卷-非医学行业第29章-入殓师，殡仪员与丧葬机构。
